## @ list.basic.md

Term 1 (basic) with # -
: - Definition 1 # -
  - Definition 2 # -
  - Definition 3 # -

Term 1 (basic) with # - \*x\*
: - *Definition* 1 # -
  - *Definition* 2 # -
  - *Definition* 3 # -

<br>

Term 1 (nested) with # -
: - Definition 1 # -
    - Sub 1 # -
    - Sub 2 # -
  - Definition 2 # -
    - Sub 1 # -
    - Sub 2 # -
  - Definition 3 # -
    - Sub 1 # -
    - Sub 2 # -

Term 1 (triple) with # -
: - Definition 1 # -
    - Sub 1 # -
      - Pub 1 # -
  - Definition 2 # -
    - Sub 1 # -
      - Pub 1 # -
  - Definition 3 # -
    - Sub 1 # -
      - Pub 1 # -
